name: EH Venture
overview:
EH Venture provides specific and customized support services for critical business processes.

EH Venture was formed to assure that the rigorous business process requirements of founding partners EquityLock Solutions (equitylocksolutions.com) and Hometown Services Company (settlementsystem.com) would be fulfilled with precision and accountability. As such, it was created to be the exclusive provider of support center services for both EquityLock and Hometown.

How We Work • Focus: We analyze business requirements.
• Engage: We consult with stakeholders and create the solutions as a team.
• Apply: We work, listen and adapt.
• Commit: We invest our resources, time and energy, and participate as a partner.
• Perform: We execute the solutions and evolve with our client. • Devote: We stand by our client every step of way.

EH Venture provides specific and customized support services for critical business processes: Business Process Analysis, Design and Development Work Flow Development, Documentation and Integration System and Technological Design, Development and Integration Marketing Plan Execution and Feedback Compliance Management Incoming and Outgoing Support Services Campaign Analysis, Design, Management and Feedback Custom Services
